text: The prehistory of Armenia means the first people in the land of Armenia. The first excavations in Armenia, were by Russian in 1876, brought to light a burial-ground near Dilijan in which were prehistoric (before history) graves. Jacques de Morgan in 1887-89 dug up 576 graves around Alaverdi and Akhatala, on the Tiflis-Alexandropol railway line. == Other websites == *Prehistoric Sites in Northern Armenia *World archaeologists have an avid interest in prehistoric Armenia Category:Ancient Armenia
title: Prehistoric Armenia
